function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inconsistent credit guarantee ratios for banks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in sars-cov-2 outcomes according to population density","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rent burden","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented demand for critical resources","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multiple informal signs and different approaches by retailers can lead to inconsistency and potential confusion among customers.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declining trust in national currency and economic policy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to implement preventive measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adaptive design strategies for public venues","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rising trend of intergenerational living may increase the risk of disease transmission within households due to close proximity and shared living spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unobserved heterogeneity in modeling framework","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of financial instability due to covid-19 impact on visitor numbers and funding sources","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate change triggering adverse environmental conditions that affect vbd incidence.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transformation of ibem deployment methodology from experience-based model to data-driven risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient support for remote working employees","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High resource utilization","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to supervised exercise and mentoring may hinder motivation for physical activity, particularly in times of stress.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scalability and cost of graphene-based coatings","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low environmental and personal hygiene awareness due to social media","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction of physical activity levels linked to worse psychological well-being","category":"Social
